line.text: But wherefore do not you a mightier way
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Make war upon this bloody tyrant Time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And fortify your self in your decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With means more blessed than my barren rhyme
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Now stand you on the top of happy hours
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And many maiden gardens yet unset
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: With virtuous wish would bear you living flowers
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Much liker than your painted counterfeit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So should the lines of life that life repair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which this (Time pencil) or my pupil pen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Neither in inward worth nor outward fair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Can make you live your self in eyes of men
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To give away your self keeps your self still
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And you must live drawn by your own sweet skill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
